org.magelan.core
Interface ExplodableEntity

All Superinterfaces:
DrawingElement, Entity
All Known Implementing Classes:
InsertEntity, PolyLineEntity, RectangleEntity
public interface ExplodableEntity
extends Entity

Defines an explodable entity. It is highly recommended that custom entities implement this interface. It is not required that the returned entities are all org.org.magelan.core.entity package members, but they in turn should be explodable as well, so that eventually a list of core entities could be obtained. This is especially important when producing files of different drawing formats, as the encoders are generally required to know only about org.org.magelan.core.entity entities. There may also be no direct equivalent for a certain entity and it has to be exploded to basic ones in order to be encoded to a specific format.

Version:
2.1, 05/2004
Author:
Assen Antov

static class ExplodableEntity.ArrayIterator
          An array iterator to be used by implamentations of the explode() method.

 java.util.Iterator explode()

Methods inherited from interface org.magelan.core.Entity
clone, equals, getColor, getID, getLayer, getLineStyle, getModifiers, getShape, getTextStyle, getThickness, hashCode, paint, setColor, setID, setLayer, setLineStyle, setTextStyle, setThickness
 

Method Detail

explode

java.util.Iterator explode()
Explodes the entity. Calling this method does not mean that the parent entity will be deleted or any other action concerning it is about to be taken. The method should not return the same entity instances more than once.

Returns:
a list of exploded entities or null, if the entity cannot be exploded
